mapper.delete: delete from api_scenario_report_detail ad where ad.report_id in (select ar.id from api_scenario_report ar where ar.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select t.* from api_scenario_report_detail t where t.report_id in (${ids}) ORDER BY FIND_IN_SET(t.report_id,${oderId})
